pageNotFound: Please double-check the URL or head back home.

planCardDescription: Manage your personal account billing details.

setup.title: Set Up Your AI Receptionist
setup.subtitle: Configure your AI-powered phone receptionist in a few simple steps

voice.title: Step 1: Voice Selection
voice.description: Choose the voice personality for your AI receptionist

knowledge.title: Knowledge Base
knowledge.description: Upload documents to train your AI receptionist
knowledge.cardDescription: Upload documents about your services, hours, policies, and FAQs
knowledge.dropFilesHere: Drop files here or click to upload
knowledge.supportedFormats: Supports PDF, DOC, DOCX, TXT files up to 10MB each
knowledge.voiceNotFound: Voice selection not found. Please go back to step 1.

integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.description: Connect your practice management system for automated appointment booking
integrations.pmsDescription: Connect your PMS to enable automatic appointment booking, patient lookups, and more
integrations.pmsIntegrationDesc: Connect your existing PMS for seamless appointment booking, patient management, and billing
integrations.pmsAlertRecommended: Recommended: PMS integration provides full patient management, billing, and insurance verification. You can always connect it later if not ready now.
integrations.otherIntegrationsDesc: Additional calendar and scheduling integrations will be available soon
integrations.calendlyDesc: Sync appointments with your Calendly account
integrations.calendarDescConnected: Optional: Add calendar sync for additional backup
integrations.calendarDescNotConnected: Alternative option if you don't have a PMS system
integrations.googleCalendarBasicSync: Sync appointments to your personal calendar
integrations.googleCalendarBasicManagement: Basic appointment management using your Google Calendar
integrations.googleCalendarNote: Note: Google Calendar provides basic appointment scheduling. For full features (patient records, billing, insurance), connect a PMS instead.
integrations.alertOptional: This integration is optional but highly recommended. Your AI receptionist will be able to book appointments, look up patient information, and handle scheduling automatically when connected.

alerts.optionalDesc: You can set up your PMS integration now or skip and set it up later from settings.
alerts.connectedDesc: Your practice management system is connected and ready to sync appointments.

benefits.title: Why Connect Your PMS?
benefits.autoSchedulingDesc: Appointments are added directly to your calendar
benefits.realTimeAvailDesc: AI knows your schedule and books accordingly

phone.title: Phone Integration
phone.description: Connect your phone number to your AI receptionist
phone.chooseMethodDesc: Select how you want to connect your phone number
phone.setupMethod: Complete the setup for your selected method
phone.selectMethod: Please select a phone integration method

sip.name: SIP Trunk
sip.description: Connect your existing PBX system via SIP

forwarded.name: Call Forwarding
forwarded.description: Forward calls from your existing number to our system
pros: Keep full control of your number
cons: Caller ID may not show correctly

ported.name: Port Number
ported.description: Transfer your existing phone number to our system

review.title: Review & Launch
review.description: Review your configuration and launch your AI receptionist
review.addPaymentMethod: Add your payment method to continue
review.reviewBeforeLaunch: Review your configuration before going live
review.configNotFound: Configuration not found. Please start from step 1.
review.voiceMissing: Voice configuration is missing. Please go back to step 1.

live.title: Your AI Receptionist is Live!
live.description: Your AI receptionist has been configured and is ready to answer calls

review.noVoice: No voice selected. Please go back to step 1.
review.noFiles: No files uploaded. You can add files later from settings.
review.noIntegrations: No integrations configured. You can add integrations later from settings.
review.readyToLaunchDesc: Your AI receptionist will be configured with a phone number automatically. You can update settings later from the dashboard.
